name: English Gamify
description:
This is a game/application to learn English through a Quiz with gamification elements.

It was thought to be used on cell phones, so this version is just an adaptation of it and for that reason some features may not work as expected.

It was also my final project for my Computer Science degree, which is why there is a form inside the app, but you can ignore it because in this version no data will be requested or stored elsewhere, being just a sample of the screens I created in this project.
